attributes.action: Stop making anodyne and insulting responses to petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitions should be used to make changes in policy. What they do is allow yet more insulting anodyne comment to be made by civil servants, who have no intention of changing anything. If they intended change, they would ensure that pensioners are not treated as 'paupers on their knees', after a lifetime of hard work

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
